question: Which number comes next in the series? 2, 4, 8, 16, ___
Which figure completes the pattern? [Triangle, Square, Triangle, Square, ?]
Fill in the blank: 5, 9, 17, 33, ___
Which letter comes next? A, D, G, J, ___
Which shape is next? [Black Circle, White Circle, Black Circle, White Circle, ?]
Find the missing number: 1, 3, 6, 10, 15, ___
Which pair comes next? (1,2), (3,4), (5,6), ___
Complete the pattern: 100, 90, 81, 73, ___
Which letter replaces the question mark? B, D, G, K, P, ___
Which is the odd one out? [Square, Triangle, Cube, Rectangle]
All roses are flowers. Some flowers fade quickly. Therefore, some roses fade quickly. Is the conclusion correct?
Which is the next term? Z, X, V, T, ___
If all engineers are smart, and Raj is an engineer, what can you conclude?
Arrange in order: Elephant, Mouse, Cat, Dog (in increasing size).
If every apple is a fruit and some fruits are sour, can you say all apples are sour?
Which is the odd one out? Book, Pen, Pencil, Apple
If today is Monday, what day will it be 10 days from now?
Which number is missing? 1, 4, 9, 16, ___, 36
Complete the analogy: Hand is to Glove as Foot is to ___
If two pencils cost ₹8, how many pencils can you buy for ₹32?
What is 15% of 200?
If 4 pens cost ₹48, how much do 7 pens cost?
What is the next number in the sequence: 2, 5, 10, 17, ___
If a train travels 60 km in 1.5 hours, what is its speed?
Which fraction is the largest: 1/2, 2/3, 3/5, 5/8?
What is 12 squared?
If a box contains 36 apples, and 9 are rotten, what percentage are rotten?
Divide 100 by 4, then add 7.
What is the value of x if x/2 = 11?
How many sides does a decagon have?
Statement: All healthy people exercise. Sita does not exercise. What can you conclude?
Which of the following weakens the argument: 'Drinking tea improves focus'?
options: Many people who do not drink tea also have good focus.

question: If A is taller than B and B is taller than C, who is the shortest?
Passage: All students must pass math to graduate. Priya did not pass math. What can you say?
What assumption is being made? 'Most birds can fly. Penguins are birds, so penguins can fly.'
Which one is an inference? 'Where there is smoke, there is fire.'
options: If smoke is seen, fire may be present

question: Statement: All engineers are good at math. Ravi is good at math. Is Ravi necessarily an engineer?
Passage: Some students who study regularly get good marks. Ravi studies regularly. Can we say Ravi gets good marks?
Which strengthens the argument: 'Exercise leads to better health'?
options: People who exercise regularly tend to have fewer health problems.
Many people are healthy without exercising.

question: Which is an example of a cause-effect relationship?
options: Sun rises and the rooster crows
Eat too much sugar and get tooth decay
Ice cream sales increase in summer
Read a book and take a test
